Key: Hey, Shido. Let's watch a movie.
Movie?
Yeah. This one. I rented it.

(I was hanging out in the living room when Kotori
brought out a movie.)
Cherry Blossom? Is it a foreign movie?
Supposedly it's the hidden gem of romance movies.
Interesting. Never heard of it.

I've only heard the title before, but I've never seen
it, so I don't really know the details.
But if it's a hidden gem, we might as well watch it.
Okay!

(I put in the disc as Kotori sat down on the sofa.
I sat next to her, and she wrapped her arms around
mine.)

(This is such a normal thing that couples do. I used
to be so shy about it just a little while ago.)
Hm...? What's the matter?
Nothing.

(Maybe I was smiling. That was a close one. I'm sure
if I said anything, she'd get shy again.)
Weirdo... Oh well. Let me play it.

(Kotori turned on the movie and dimmed the lights
a bit. Shortly after, the title appeared.)
(And so the story began.)
Hey!
Ah?!

(I spat out the tea I had in my mouth. The movie
turned into a passionate love scene.)

(There was intense kissing, and it was hard for me to
look directly at it. I-Is this... really for all ages?!
This... is crazy.

(Kotori hid her face with her hands as she muttered.
She seems to not be watching, but I can see she's
looking through her fingers.)
A-Are couples really like this...
(Kotori softly put her hands on mine.)

...?! No, no, no. That's not true! This is special!
Special! So don't let it bother you.

(I felt like she was asking for something and I
panicked. I wanted to think I was imagining things,
so I looked at Kotori.)

(But Kotori didn't seem to notice me watching since
she was glued to the screen.)
Composure... Keep your composure.
Phew...

(As we did that, the movie ended, and I took a deep
breath. It was love scenes after love scenes, and my
heart was pounding basically the whole time.)

(But because they loved one another, they expressed
how their separation and reunion was important. It
was certainly a very touching movie.)
...That was intense.

Yeah... I didn't know what to expect, but I was really
touched.

(That was all I could say. I was touched but
embarrassed in a weird way. The love scenes still
ingrained in my head made my body feel hot.)

(Ahh... It's so weird. I pictured Kotori and myself
like that, and now I can't look her in the face...)
...Hey, Shido?

(I almost jumped out of my seat. It's okay. It's
okay... I don't think she's caught on...)

All right. Now that the movie's over, why don't we go
to bed now? Yeah!
Sh-Shido? What's the matter?

Well, I mean, it's pretty late right? Come on, Kotori.
You need to go to your room and sleep now. See you
tomorrow! Good night!

(I pushed Kotori from behind and rushed her to her
room. I jumped into my room to calm myself down.)
Phew... Finally I've calmed down.
Gosh. That was one crazy movie.

(It was a little too stimulating. Of all the people to
watch it alone with, it was Kotori...)
*gasp*! No, no! I can't remember it!

(All I could see was Kotori's face and the movie from
earlier. I tried to scrub the image from my brain.)

(I-I'm going to sleep! I'll sleep to get it out of my
mind.)

(That's my only choice. I rushed to my bed and dove
in. At that moment―)
Shido, can I come in?
K-Kotori?!
(My heart jumped again at having a sudden visitor.)

(Calm down. I need to keep my cool. I'm not doing
anything bad. It's fine.)
*inhale*... *exhale*
(I took a deep breath and got up.)
S-Sure.

(I settled down enough to answer the door, and Kotori
entered slowly, hugging a pillow.)
What's the matter?
Um...
(She looked at me with puppy dog eyes and whispered.)
...Can I sleep with you... tonight?
...WHAT?!

(Those words were destructive, and my brain just
stopped. What is she saying...)
P-Please?
WAIT, WAIT, WAIT, WAIT! Just wait a minute!
(I stopped Kotori as she was walking in.)
C-C-C-CALM DOWN, KOTORI! It's too early for us!

I mean, I'd be lying if I said I wasn't interested...
But it's just too...
...Excuse me? What are you talking about?

Huh...? O-Oh... when you say sleep together... You
meant it in a normal way?

(Kotori gave me a blank stare. The next moment, her
eyes flared. I felt like I heard the fire turn on!)
Y-You're so dumb, you pervert! O-O-O-OF COURSE!
R-R-R-R-RIGHT! S-sorry!
I just... wanted to sleep with you like I used to...
...I see. Then I guess that's fine.
(Kotori just wanted to sleep with me like old times.)

(When we were kids, we used to sleep in the same
bed a lot. So I don't think it's bad. But a part of me
feels like it's wrong.)
Yeah. If you're okay with it, it's not an issue.
It... kinda is, though...
What? You said okay, so take responsibility!
(She threw the pillow at me, and it hit my face.)
S-Sorry...

I-I was just thinking I could keep you company from
time to time so you don't get lonely!
(Did the movie affect Kotori...?)
O-Okay. Then only tonight, okay?
...Okay.
W-We're just going to sleep! Okay?!
I-I know that!
(Seriously... I'm too easy on Kotori.)

(Kotori changed into her pajamas and snuggled into
the bed.)

Y-You'd better not do... anything weird like that
movie.
I won't. I'm turning the light off.
Okay. Night, Shido.
Yeah. Night, Kotori.

(I turned the lights off and shut my eyes. Kotori said
that, but I can't get the imagery from the movie out
of my head. It took a while for me to fall asleep.)
(What's going on...? It's hard to sleep...)
Shido...

(In my slumber, I thought I heard someone call my
name.)
Whoa... Kotori?

(She treated me like a body pillow and clung onto my
body.)

(Not only were her arms wrapped around me, even her
legs and body were tight against mine.)
Hey... I can't move like this.
(I guess the cause was her inability to sleep.)
Gosh...

(I can't wake her up, so I guess I have no choice but
to sleep like this. Good night, Kotori.)
...I can't sleep.
(Kotori was deep asleep, but I was wide awake.)

(Well, obviously. Kotori was sleeping next to me. And
she's very close.)

(Kotori was soft and she smelled good. It's like all
of my senses were heightened in the darkness.)

(But I won't do anything. But still this isn't good
for me.)
Mm... Zzz...
Gosh, she totally has her guard down.

(Kotori is sleeping peacefully. She doesn't seem like
she'll wake up easily.)
I'll stay still so she won't wake up
I-I can touch her a little right?
Well, I guess I have to endure it until morning.

(I gave up on falling asleep and decided to watch
Kotori sleep. I can at least do this much, right?)
Shido...
Hm?

(Is she talking in her sleep? She called my name
again. Just then, tears streamed down her face.)
Shido. Don't go anywhere...

(Is she having a dream that I'm going to leave? That's
not good.)
No, Shido...

(Kotori's grip tightened. Maybe she's was holding
tightly so I wouldn't go anywhere.)
Don't worry. I'll always be by your side, Kotori.

(I whispered into her ear and wiped away her tears.
And then I patted her head.)

I will never leave you behind. We'll always be
together, Kotori.
Hehehe.
Shido... I love you...

(Kotori's expression softened. I made a promise to
myself.)
I will protect you forever.
...Okay.
(As if she heard, Kotori nodded.)

(Is she awake or not...? Well, it doesn't matter. It's
not like I'd be troubled if she heard it.)
I love you, Kotori.
(In the dark room, I softly kissed Kotori's cheek.)

(Look how defenseless she looks. It's hard for me to
hold back, you know.)

I-I can touch her a little and she won't wake up,
right?
Kotori? Kotori-saaaan?
Mmm...
(She wouldn't wake up, nor did her breathing change.)
(All right... She won't wake up!)

(I made a fist happily. I slowly reached for Kotori's
body.)

(Kotori's pajamas exposed just the right amount. Her
pale skin showed a little... So poisonous to the eyes.
(I'm just adjusting her clothes... That's all.)
Mmm...

(Right before I touched her, a sharp pain went through
my neck.)
Ow... Gah...!
(She elbowed me... I can barely talk...)
Hmph... I will give.. my godly hands...

(She was choking me with such intensity and accuracy.
I-Is she awake?!)
K-Kotori...! I give up!
MMMMM....
AGAAHAHAHA....
Sh-She's choking me. A... My consciousness―
(―My memory ended there.)
It's morning. Shido, wake up.
Mm...
(She shook my body, and I was slowly coming to.)
Mmm... *yawn*... Morning, Kotori.
Morning, Shido.
Did you wake up before me?
Kinda.

(Kotori had changed into her uniform. She seemed to
have gone back to her room while I was sleeping.)
Th-Thanks for last night. Sorry for being so pushy.

(She adjusted her hair and blushed as she thanked me.
I smiled.)
Were you relieved to see me in my room?
Huh?

(Kotori's eyes grew wide as if I hit the nail on the
head.)
H-How did you know?!
Because I felt relieved that you came to wake me up.

(Morning came and Kotori wakes me up. Like any other
day.)

(So much happens every day, but I feel like the day
has to start like this.)

I'm always prepared to be woken up by you. Don't
worry. You can come to wake me up every morning.
Shido...
(Kotori smiled happily and put her hand on her chest.)

Hey, but you should at least try to wake up on your
own sometimes.

That I can't promise. If I wake up on my own, I think
you'll cry from the loneliness.
What?! I-I wouldn't cry over that!

Really? You looked like you were about to cry and
say, You didn't wait for me!""

Sh-Shut up! Just hurry up and wake up! It's almost
breakfast time!

(She rushed me out of the room. Kotori whispered as
she pushed against my back.)

Shido, I just want you to shut up and listen to me.
If you do that, I'll always take care of you.
Okay, okay. I got it, Princess.
What! Y-You're making fun of me!
No, I'm not.
(I turned around and looked at Kotori.)
You're always going to be with me, right? Thanks.
Oh...
(Kotori's eyes grew wide, and immediately she smiled.)
Of course!

(I ingrained her bright, sun-like smile into my
memory.)
